item.title: add teamplify.com
item.description: https://teamplify.com - improve team development processes with Team Analytics and Smart Daily Standup. Includes full-featured Time Off management for remote-first teams. Free for small teams up to 5 users.

item.title: change the hyphon
item.description:
https://budibase.com/ - Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s
https://www.appsmith.com/ - Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.
https://www.tooljet.com/ - Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder.

item.title: create a section following the same format
item.description:
#low-code-platform -
https://leancloud.app/) — Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform - Mobile backend. 1GB of data storage, 256MB instance, 3K API requests/day, 10K pushes/day are free. (API is very similar to Parse Platform)
#table-of-contents - top](#table-of-contents)**
https://budibase.com/ - Budibase is an open-source low-code platform for creating internal apps in minutes. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, MongoDB, Rest API, Docker, K8s
https://www.appsmith.com/ - Low code project to build admin panels, internal tools, and dashboards. Integrates with 15+ databases and any API.
https://www.tooljet.com/ - Extensible low-code framework for building business applications. Connect to databases, cloud storages, GraphQL, API endpoints, Airtable, etc and build apps using drag and drop application builder.
